channel.title: Tech on Live before you leave
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on Live before you leave

item.title: Work on Aerial Robot
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Dimple Bhuta)
item.description:
1. Build a Quadcopter from scratch
  2. Fly the Quadcopter manually

item.title: Build and Develop Stealth Robot
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Dimple Bhuta)
item.description: My dream project is to develop and work on a stealth robot that seamlessly integrates navigation in unstructured and adverse environments with secure data transfer back to the source. While I am still figuring out where to start, I am determined to make it a reality. I want to achieve this goal before my 60th birthday.

item.title: Publish Research Papers
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Dimple Bhuta)
item.description:
• My work on the sense-and-avoid module is accepted at the Agricontrol Conference.

  • I am planning to submit another paper or journal on oil/water surface spillage detection from underground pipelines using multispectral cameras.

item.title: Become an Excellent Programmer
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Dimple Bhuta)
item.description:
To strengthen my programming skills, I need to focus on:

  • C++
  • Python
  • Data Structures

Additionally, I aim to improve my competitive programming abilities by practicing on platforms like LeetCode, HackerRank etc. I want to achieve this goal by Jan 8, 2028

item.title: Work and explore different countries

item.description: To achieve this I will focus on coding, ROS based projects and keep applying via LINKEDIN. üíºüí∞üåç
